about_the_game:
Electronic music trailblazer Giorgio Moroder and co-composer/producer Raney Shockne teamed up to create a next-generation soundtrack for TRON RUN/r. Focusing on the edginess of the game design and marrying sonic notions of speed and space with data streaming and AI, Moroder and Shockne created a memorable soundscape that ties perfectly to the onscreen action in the game. A handpicked team of cutting-edge remixers was then asked to reinterpret and extend this work. The result is a breathtakingly sweeping soundtrack that stands on its own as a wothy successor to the iconic soundtracks for the TRON films. Featured remixers are Autechre, Rusko, Plaid, Darkstar, patten and Bibio.

Tracklist:
1. Run Program – Moroder/Shockne
2. Run Program (Bibio Remix) - Moroder/Shockne
3. Recursion - Moroder/Shockne
4. Invalid Path - Moroder/Shockne
5. Invalid Path (Darkstar Remix) - Moroder/Shockne
6. Delta Antliae (Nicholls Remix) - Moroder/Shockne
7. Delta Antliae (patten Remix) - Moroder/Shockne
8. 611 Time Out - Moroder/Shockne
9. 611 Time Out (Autechre Remix) - Moroder/Shockne
10. Decrypted - Moroder/Shockne
11. Memory String - Moroder/Shockne
12. Memory String (Plaid Remix) - Moroder/Shockne
13. Parity Error - Moroder/Shockne
14. Parity Error (Rusko Remix) - Moroder/Shockne

name: TRON RUN/r Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Dive deeper into the world of TRON with the TRON RUN/r Original Soundtrack from electronic music trailblazer Giorgio Moroder and co-composer/producer Raney Shockne, featuring remixes by Autechre, Rusko, Plaid, Darkstar, patten and Bibio.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
